string-array.name: messageArray
string-array.item: Did you know that each poll has a closing time and date allocated to it,so hurry up and cast your vote!
Did you know that you can share your poll on other social media
Did you know that you can vote for a poll and return to see the final poll results?
Did you know that you will receive a notification every time a new poll is being published,just to keep you connected
